name: com.aminhp.comfyui-bridge
description: A runtime bridge connecting Unity to ComfyUI. Execute workflows for Image, Audio, and 3D Model generation with support for RenderTextures and a non-blocking queue system.

samples.description: Scenes demonstrating Text-to-Image, Image-to-Image, 3D Model and Audio generation, as well as Multi-Run Queueing and runtime parameter modification.
